pageContent: Objective: To report on the short-term functional and oncological results, from one institution, of high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) for treating localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Location of residual cancer after transrectal high-intensity focused ultrasound ablation for clinically localized prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21711432/
